alert.note: Alert for Hardeman; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 5:17PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Hardeman and southwestern McNairy Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 517 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Pocahontas, or 9 miles northwest of Big Hill Pond State Park, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Selmer, Big Hill Pond State Park, Eastview, Ramer, Hornsby, Rose Creek, Hebron, Chewalla and Lacy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
